location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly to Captain Arthur William Roberts, Political Agent, Eastern States, Bhurtpore [Bharatpur]

physicalDescription.extent: The letter is written on the verso of the folio.

mods.abstract: Brief letter regarding a memorandum from Colonel William Earle concerning the movement of the Viceroy (Thomas George Baring, 2nd Baron Northbrook) to Bhurtpore [Bharatpur]. The memorandum is no longer enclosed with the letter.
